name: Hilarious Name Generator
description: Struggling to come up with a name that's so funny, it'll make milk shoot out of your nose? Look no further! Our Hilarious Name Generator is here to bless you with a side-splitting moniker. Get ready to ROFL!
introduction: Let's face it, some names are just...boring. But not today! Prepare to unleash your inner comedian with names so absurd and ridiculous, they're guaranteed to get a laugh. Whether you need a funny nickname for your friend, a silly stage name, or just want to brighten your day, this generator is your ticket to hilarity.
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button. It's that easy! (We promise, no PhD in Comedy required.)
Keep clicking until you find a name that tickles your funny bone. Don't be shy, experiment!
Share your newfound hilarious name with the world (or at least your group chat). Prepare for the laughter to commence!
If you're feeling extra creative, mix and match prefixes and suffixes to create your own comedy masterpiece. Go wild!

faqs.question: Is this generator actually funny, or just trying to be?
faqs.answer: We've packed it with so much silliness, it's practically overflowing! We can't guarantee you'll split your sides, but we're pretty confident you'll crack a smile (or ten).

faqs.question: Can I use these names for professional purposes?
faqs.answer: Well, that depends on your profession! If you're a clown, absolutely! If you're a heart surgeon...maybe not. Use your best judgment.

faqs.question: Are the names generated completely random?
faqs.answer: Mostly! We've curated a collection of funny words and phrases, and then let the algorithm do its wacky thing. There's a method to the madness...sort of.

faqs.question: Will I find a name that's offensive or inappropriate?
faqs.answer: We strive for good, clean (ish) fun. While some names might be a little edgy, we've tried to avoid anything truly offensive. If you do stumble upon something you find inappropriate, please let us know!

faqs.question: I generated a name so funny, I snorted my coffee. Are you responsible for cleaning my keyboard?
faqs.answer: Unfortunately, no. But we'll gladly accept the credit for the laughter! Coffee-related keyboard casualties are a risk we're willing to take in the name of comedy.

faqs.question: Can I suggest new words or phrases to add to the generator?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We're always looking to expand our arsenal of hilarity. Send us your suggestions, and we'll see if they make the cut!
